text: Whitney Eve Port (born March 4, 1985) is an American television personality, fashion designer and writer of books. She was born and raised in Los Angeles, California. She attended Crossroads School in Santa Monica. In 2006, Port became famous when she appeared on the reality series The Hills on MTV. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Television personalities from Los Angeles Category:American fashion designers Category:Writers from Los Angeles Category:Participants in American reality television series
title: Whitney Port
